code: import{useState}from"react";import{Link,useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import"./question.styles.scss";import Questions from"../../common/api/questionsApi.json";import jOrp=cntJ>cntP?"J":"P";navigate("/result/".concat(eOri).concat(sOrn).concat(tOrf).concat(jOrp));}};const handleOnClick0=()=>{console.log(questionNumber);const
